mapper.insert: insert into member (member_number, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_password, member_store_name, member_store_phone, member_store_category, member_preorder) values (#{memberNumber}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberStoreName}, #{memberStorePhone}, #{memberStoreCategory}, #{memberPreorder})
mapper.select: select member_password from member where member_email = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: update member set member_preorder = #{memberPreorder}} where member_number = #{memberNumber}
